query:
ALTER TABLE oee_alert_history 
ADD COLUMN acknowledged TINYINT(1) DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN acknowledged_at DATETIME NULL,
ADD COLUMN acknowledged_by VARCHAR(255) NULL,
ADD COLUMN resolved TINYINT(1) DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN resolved_at DATETIME NULL,
ADD COLUMN resolved_by VARCHAR(255) NULL,
ADD COLUMN resolution TEXT NULL;
